On 30 Nov 2016, clashes between the Maute Group and the Army continued in Butig town, Lanao del Sur, resulting in the military gaining control over the Maute camp in Butig on this day. Over the course of the fighting in Butig (24-30 Nov), a total of 62 Maute rebels were killed while 12 rebels and 30 soldiers were wounded as per government sources. (Fatalities divided across 7 events.)

source: Philippine Star; Foundation for Media Alternatives

Around 2000 - 3200 protesters gathered at Mabuhay Rotonda in Quezon City, Metro Manila on 30 Nov 2016 and marched towards the People Power Monument at EDSA to demonstrate against the burial of the late Ferdinand Marcos at Heroes' Cemetery (Libingan ng mga Bayani).
